text: The 1992 UEFA European Under-16 Championship was the tenth edition of UEFA's European Under-16 Football Championship. Cyprus hosted the championship, during May 7–17, 1992. 16 teams entered the competition, and Germany won their second title, their first after their reunification. ==Squads== ==Qualifying==
